Sequence Information.Peptide Name: AM29A5-syn (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals. 3S=S, UCSS1a; XXA)

Literature.Author: Ghazal A, Clarke D, Abdel-Rahman MA, Ribeiro A, Collie-Duguid E, Pattinson C, Burgoyne K, Muhammad T, Alfadhel S, Heidari Z, Samir R, Gerges MM, Nkene I, Colamarino RA, Hijazi K, Houssen WE.2023
Literature.Title: Venomous gland transcriptome and venom proteomic analysis of the scorpion Androctonus amoreuxi reveal new peptides with anti-SARS-CoV-2 activity.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (43.59%) toplant Cycloviolacin H4C: 17%;   GRAVY: -0.75; M Wt: 4002.583; M formula: C165H265N48O54S6; mol ex coeff: 8905.Activity: it showed antiviral activity against SARS-CoV-2 Lineage B.1.1.7 (IC50 200 nM).MOA:virus: possibly bind to SARS-CoV-2 spike protein and to inhibit its interaction with hACE2. Updated 4/2024
